page.title: 16Housing in Epworth.
page.content: Epworth has been expanding steadily since The Second World War and we now have three quite large housing estates. A problem has recently arisen because virtually all of the land now needed for further development around the village is good quality agricultural land.It is difficult to decide whether farmland should be built on or left to produce food on which we depend. Recently most new houses have been built in gaps between existing built up areas but such spaces are becoming rare.One solution would be to prevent any further development from occuring but this is not easy because Epworth is such a popular place and a lot of people do want to come here to live.
